thread.title: Paura Mixes Destroyed Knitwear and Velvet Track Ensembles for FW17
thread.title_full: Paura Mixes Destroyed Knitwear and Velvet Track Ensembles for FW17

author: Kam Dhillon
title: Paura Mixes Destroyed Knitwear and Velvet Track Ensembles for FW17
text:
Visit the original post to see all 12 images from this gallery. 
Brand: Paura
Key Pieces: The bulky green puffer jacket cuts a wide and perfectly cropped silhouette on top, and those wide-leg pinstripe trousers can look good with anything from elements of formal steez to vintage sportswear.
Editor’s Notes: Hot on the heels of its FW17 capsule titled “My Closet,” Italian up-and-comer Paura returns with its latest lookbook that’s a put together, yet disheveled, lesson in layering. The Kurt Cobain-inspired distressed knitwear works extremely well with those indulgent velvet track ensembles and the brand’s outerwear offering is particularly strong and surprisingly eclectic. There’s everything from embossed outerwear to metallic puffers to heavy-duty duffle coats and it’s all sublime.
For more fashion news, check out Danish label Apocs’ Yves Klein inspired SS17 lookbook.
